title: Buster Crabbe | Badge of Honor (1934, Drama) directed by Spencer Gordon Bennet | Full Movie

sources.title: Buster Crabbe | Badge of Honor (1934, Drama) directed by Spencer Gordon Bennet | Full Movie
sources.description:
Playboy, Bob Gordon comes from a rich background but wants make it on his own. He dreams of becoming a newspaper reporter and he eventually gets his chance. Hoping to impress the pretty Helen Brewster he poses as a newspaperman and goes after a big story about the town's corrupt local politicians.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/Ir1Z2_Hi8fY


Original title: Badge of Honor (1934)

Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet
Writers: George Morgan, Robert Emmett Tansey
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Ruth Hall, Ralph Lewis
Genres: Classics, Drama, Romance 

@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
